name: Passpartout (Prototype)
description:
Release version available at: https://flamebait.itch.io/passpartout-the-starving-artist

Check out our website: http://www.flamebaitgames.com/

-------------------------

Draw your own art and sell it in your gallery. Even you can be a successful artist!

Disclaimer: Please keep in mind that this is a prototype version that was developed over the course of one and a half weeks, and the main purpose of it was to evaluate the core concept and whether we were going to continue development.

We use Unity Analytics in this game which gathers anonymous data when played. This data is only used by the team and it's purpose is to serve as guidlines to help us evaluate this prototype.

Created by Flamebait Games: flamebaitgames.com
